ID_INVALID: Invalid ID number: it must be a positive integer number
ID_SIZE: Invalid ID size: it must be less
EMAIL_INVALID: Invalid Email, try again with a valid one
EMAIL_REQUIRED: Email is required for this request
FIRST_NAME_SIZE: First name must be min 2 and max 20 characters
FIRST_NAME_REQUIRED: First name is required for this request
LAST_NAME_SIZE: Last name must be min 2 and max 20 characters
URL_INVALID: Url must have a valid format, try a new one.
